author: nflaig
content:
Even when adding those I don't see any builder blocks, on mev-relay it doesn't show any payloads either. I waited until epoch 5 which should be sufficient based on https://docs.kurtosis.com/how-to-full-mev-with-ethereum-package/. 

Might be an issue with mev-flood? I noticed the same error as reported in this issue https://github.com/flashbots/mev-flood/issues/59.

I am not testing pectra, just mixed client setup.
